title: SoundSpheres
blurb: An audio memory visual puzzle where you combine different spheres to create music
content_html:
Inspiration

We love puzzle games and interacting with music and so made a music puzzle game that takes advantage of virtual reality's power of immersion!

What it does

A musical puzzle game where you have to place the right Sound Spheres on the right beat pillars to match a song.

How we built it

Utilizing Unity 3D, music creation software, and C# script.

Challenges we ran into

Our main challenges included how to get physics materials working, setting up the music to effect the environmental displays, and how to incorporate UI into the experience.

Accomplishments that we're proud of

We are exceptionally proud of the overall aesthetic, the gameplay mechanics, and the link between interactivity and sound.

What we learned

SO MUCH UNITY! This was a very good experience on

What's next for Sound Spheres

Maybe we'll get together and finish the experience; build it out into something really spectacular.
